attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: A new collaboration between artists and AI is emerging, as Canadian-Chinese artist Sougwen Chung views AI not as a threat but as an opportunity for artistic creation.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: China's electric vehicle manufacturers are expanding their innovations into humanoid robots, showcased at a high-profile New Year Gala, reflecting the country's commitment to integrating advanced robotics into mainstream culture.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: Researchers from the Whitehead Institute and CSAIL have developed a machine-learning model that can predict protein localization, which could lead to significant advancements in medical science and disease treatment.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: The EU AI Act is prompting discussions in the U.S. regarding AI regulation, highlighting a growing international concern about the ethical implications of artificial intelligence technologies.
